software_dependencies.modules: depends on the contents of the MOD_FILE environment variable

executables.NEMS.x: the executable that is run by the batch script

software_dependencies.bin_dir: the directory containing the NEMS.x executable (optional)

environment_variables.BIN_DIR: the directory containing the NEMS.x executable (optional)
